definitions.definition: a person, typically one more remote than a grandparent, from whom one is descended.
examples: my ancestor Admiral Anson circumnavigated the globe 250 years ago
synonyms: primogenitor "he could trace his ancestors back to colonial Boston"

definitions.definition: an early type of animal or plant from which others have evolved.
an early version of a machine, system, etc.
examples: this instrument is an ancestor of the lute
synonyms: predecessor "the instrument is an ancestor of the lute"
